[1]:

import shnitsel as st
# import shnitsel.xarray

[ ]:

from shnitsel.data.tree import ShnitselDB

dt = st.io.read('tut_data/traj_I02.nc', kind='shnitsel')
assert isinstance(dt, ShnitselDB)
ds = dt['I02'].as_stacked

[7]:

mol = st.bridges.to_mol(ds.atXYZ.isel(frame=0), charge=1)
mol

[7]:

[8]:

from shnitsel.filtering.structure_selection import StructureSelection

# mol = ds.st.default_mol()  # Check whether default_mol returns a copy of mol attr
# d_flag, img = st.geo.geomatch.flag_bonds(mol, smarts=, draw=True)
structure_selection = StructureSelection.init_from_mol(
    mol=mol, default_selection=['atoms', 'bonds', 'dihedrals']
)

# Restrict all bonds, atoms and dihedrals to the relevant subset
dihedral_selection = structure_selection.select_bats('CC=CC')
dihedral_selection.draw(flag_level=4)

[8]:

[12]:

from shnitsel.geo.geocalc import get_dihedrals

# Calculate dihedrals at the end of the trajectories
dih_end = (
    get_dihedrals(ds.atXYZ, structure_selection=dihedral_selection, deg=True)
    .groupby('atrajectory')
    .last()
)
# Get proportion
proportion = (dih_end > 100).sum() / dih_end.sizes['atrajectory']
proportion = proportion.item()
proportion

[12]:

0.3125

[14]:

# Find only the central double bond in dihedral
double_bond_selection = dihedral_selection.select_bonds('C=C')

# Make sure the bond is unique
assert len(double_bond_selection.bonds_selected) == 1, "Found more than 1 relevant bond"
# Get bond index in mol
bond_index = double_bond_selection.bond_descriptor_to_mol_index(
    list(double_bond_selection.bonds_selected)
)[0]
# Assign the label to the bond
dihedral_selection.mol.GetBondWithIdx(bond_index).SetProp(
    'bondNote', f"{proportion * 100:.0f}%"
)
# Visualize selection
dihedral_selection.draw()
